snippet.title: Rogue Candy - Prototype Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Rogue Candy on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3548650/Rogue_Candy/

Welcome to the sweet and chaotic world of Rogue Candy! A 3D Action Rogue-Like FPS where the landscape is crafted from sugary treats and the inhabitants are living, jiggly candy creatures.

Your goal is to reach the giant candy castle and defeat the residing main boss, but be wary... The further you proceed, the more dangerous the world becomes, so make sure to explore the candy-filled environments and gather loot from defeated candy creatures to upgrade your character and match your foes!
Game Features:

- Strengthen your character by finding perk stations and upgrade shops scattered throughout the world, enhancing your abilities and firepower with synergy builds.
- Each run offers a unique experience with a randomized open-world map build with different handmade candy-themed biomes, with future updates introducing chocolate, waffle, and licorice.
- Defeat a variety of sugary enemies and bosses using physics-based combat that adds chaos and fun to every fight!

With pre-designed level chunks and random seed-based world generation, no two runs are the same, ensuring endless replayability with a beautiful candy world aesthetic. Get ready to experience a sugar rush of excitement and chaos!

#indiegame #shootergames #roguelike
